title: Agent Skill Manifest
description: JSON schema for validating skill manifest metadata extracted from SKILL.md frontmatter

name.description: Unique skill identifier (lowercase alphanumeric with hyphens only)

description.description: Human-readable skill description for search and discovery

author.description: Creator display name (individual, team, or organization)

tags.description: Searchable category tags for skill discovery

dependencies.description: Required skill dependencies (must be installed before this skill)

license.description: SPDX license identifier or custom license string
